item.description:
I'll be there at 7 to hold the table and play board games/cards. If you want to play, you must be there by 8:30. That's when they ask for $ and team names. They won't accept more than 5 per team so if you show up after the game has started we might be full. The game is over around 11:15/11:30.

If you've RSVP'd as "yes" and can't make it PLEASE call or text me and let me know.

Start thinking up those dirty team names!!!

Natalie is the contact for this event 512-413-4119 (fyi, trivia is in the basement so reception is pretty lousy. Also you're not allowed to have your phone out during the quiz so after 9 we'll be unreachable.)
item.name: Trivia Time!
